Reviews.Title: “Family owned property that treat you like family”
Reviews.Author: Judy1002
Reviews.Content: visited alimandi 3 times trips italy time welcomed home twice brought family friends husband clean airconditioned owners staff rooftop breakfasts top notch especially liked steps vatican museum highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “fantastic, comfortable and friendly hotel in a perfect spot !!”
Reviews.Author: mikkiduf
Reviews.Content: hotel alimandi value prime location staff friendly helpful clean air conditioned hotel steps vatican museum entrance st peters square breakfast included price dining top building lovely atrium views vatican easily hop metro visit roman sites fantastic value excellent accomodations definitely stay charming comfortable

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Alimandi Tunisi-friendly staff but nothing like a 3 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: mitchwonder
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel alimandi hotel alimandi stayed night moving hotel night looked dorm walls thin hear water running bathroom quality building furniture poor 3 star hotel staff excellent friendly
